item.title: Act Now — Google Uncovers Chrome 142 Security Fix For 3 Billion Users
item.description: As Google confirms 20 new Chrome web browser security issues, here’s what you must do to ensure you are safe.

item.title: Cigna Profits Hit Nearly $2 Billion Despite Rising Costs
item.description: The Cigna Group reported third quarter net income of nearly $2 billion despite rising costs in the health plans it sells.

item.title: TEAC Adds To Its Reference 500 Series With The Launch Of The NT-507T Network Transport
item.description: Japan’s TEAC has announced the NT-507T, a dedicated network streaming transport that joins TEAC's Reference 500 Series like the TEAC UD-507 DAC/preamp...

item.title: Forests And Soil Reaching Critical Limits To Store Carbon, Study Finds
item.description: The 10 New Insights in Climate Science report warns weaker land carbon sinks, threaten to derail emissions projections and accelerating global warming...

item.title: The New Generation Of Ocean Robots That Navigate Like Sea Creatures
item.description: Underwater work is redefined with autonomous robots that see and hear like a sea creature.
